reviewText: rating based on my 10 year old's opinion of the game. She loves it and plays it often. The interface is decent for a dvd game and responds well to the remote commands on several of our DVD players (Sony, Bose, Toshiba)

OMGosh! This interactive Harry Potter game was the perfect gift for our grandchildren. They play it several times everyday. I just wish there were more Harry Potter interactive DVD games for purchase!

A lot of DVD games like this that are interactive movies and cartoons don't play well on all DVD players and systems. Check the remote sensitivity too. Different DVD players and remotes respond differently on DVD games. If there's any issues check the compatibility of the DVD player with the game. My game had a couple slowing down issues and didn't respond perfectly with my DVD player but it worked perfect when I played it on my PS3 and PS4 system.
My grandkids are Harry Potter fans and they played this game on the TV within an hour of opening it on Christmas Day and loved it
my grandkids love them

This is an awesome game.  I played it with my son & grandson & considering it is played on your DVD player & is not that hi-tech, we loved it!  Great for a family.  Loved it so much I ordered another!
